name: Digital Audio Compression (AC-3), Revision A (ATSC Doc. A/52A) (formal name); AC-3 and Dolby Digital (common names)
description: Lossy format designed for the efficient encoding of surround sound, developed to support motion picture presentations in theaters and at home.
